UnitDefinition.Name: Expression type
UnitDefinition.Description: Expression types define the way in which a substance amount may be standardised, or possible other way expressed. For example, a substance in urine may be expressed in terms of a creatinine standardisation. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: lipids
Unit.Description: Standardise lipid-soluble substances by total lipid content.

Unit.Name: creatinine
Unit.Description: Standardise substance concentrations by creatinine content.
